Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Overwrites the bouquet acceptance dialogue. Please turn this off if you do not plan on dating Chrissy.

Entries.Chrissy: This is incredible! I wanna slurp yah! $6/-5 305 272 306 307 308 807/Wow, you're actually not a complete moron. This is pretty neat. $1//This is cringe. $2//This reminds me of the time my little brother drank a candle, are you as thick as him? $2/-4/I AM THE LORD OF DARKNESS. $8//

Entries.ChrissyMail.SecretWoods: Hi @,^I want to explain everything, so please meet me in the secret forest tomorrow at noon. I promise I'm a good person.^^Thanks.^-Chrissy[#]Meet Me in the Woods
Entries.ChrissyMail.Picnic: Hey @,^Next Tuesday, come to the Cindersnap Forest. I want to do something special for all that you've done for me.^^And don't forget to bring your juicy bottom.^^-Chrissy[#]@.
Entries.ChrissyMail.MagicShow: Dear @,^Tomorrow I've decided to host a magic show in town, and everyone is invited. It would mean the world to me if you came.^I cannot wait to see you.^^You know what I mean. Don't make me say it to your face, you moron.^^-Chrissy[#]You better be there!

Entries.NPC.cs.3962: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: Ar- Are you serious @?‚Äù $1#$b# Of course, I'll marry you! $1

Entries.Chrissy0: MARRIAGE IS AWESOME. I CANNOT WAIT. $4#$e# FOREVER LOVE.$1
Entries.Chrissy1: I seriously can't believe I'm so lucky. $4#$e# Back on my home planet, we don't do weddings, so I never thought this would happen to me! $4

Entries.Chrissy: I love rainy days. $1#$e# Just the sound of the drops hitting the window soothes me. $1#$b# I'm not going soft, I just like the sky water! $4

Entries.Sun6: I hope I can talk to my uncle again soon. $3
Entries.Mon6: Things have been really awkward back at my house lately. $2

Entries.Chrissy: I love rainy days almost as much as I love you $1

Entries.1116012/f Chrissy 500/d Mon Wed Thu Fri: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 70 37 2 Chrissy 70 46 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/showframe Chrissy 16/fade/viewport 70 45 true/move farmer 0 5 2/stopMusic/emote Chrissy 56/playMusic poppy/speak Chrissy "It's a Sunny Day, $8 #$b#I hope it stays that Way, $8#$b#My hair's just a little gray, $8 #$b#I just got a raise, $8 #$b#And I'm deserving of some praise, $8 #$b#So today we eat some mayonnaise, $8"/animate Chrissy false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/playSound gulp/message "Chrissy brings the jar of mayonnaise to her mouth, and chugs it, in one gulp!"/showframe Chrissy 0/speak Chrissy "Mayonnaise Monday, $8#$b#It's Mayonnaise Monday! $8"/message "Chrissy grabs a second jar of mayonnaise"/showframe Chrissy 16/stopMusic/question fork0 "What should you do?#I can't let this go on any longer.#I'll just leave her alone.#"/fork MayoTime/move farmer -12 0 1/end warpOut/
Entries.MayoTime: move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Chrissy 0/speak Chrissy "@, what are you doing here?$2#$b#I swear, it's not what it looks like. This isn't a normal thing I do. $3#$b# It- It's a family tradition. I- I know it's a little weird, but my brother started it when we were kids. When I miss him, I have my Mayonnaise Mondays.$3"/question fork1 "You don't think it's weird right?#I get it. I miss my family sometimes too.#I'm not sure I can be your friend anymore.#"/fork MayoTime2/speak Chrissy "I completely understand. $3"/friendship Chrissy -20/move farmer 0 -12 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.MayoTime2: friendship Chrissy 50/playMusic ragtime/speak Chrissy "Really? I knew you were cool @.$1#$b# Please just don't tell anybody about this?$4#$b#Especially not Uncle Lew.$7#$b# I'm glad it was someone like you who found me. $7"/speak Chrissy "Mayonnaise Monday.$8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy "Thanks for keeping my secret $1#$b# I owe you one. $6#$b#I'll see if I can find any 'additional tax write offs' for you this spring."

Entries.1769801/f Chrissy 1000/t 900 2100/F: continue/42 72/farmer 35 73 3 Chrissy 43 72 0 Vincent 42 72 1/skippable/pause 1500/speak Vincent "Hey lady, I'm bored. $0"/speak Chrissy "Good to know. $2"/speak Vincent "Can you do something funny? $0"/speak Chrissy "Why don't you ask your burnout brother? $2"/speak Vincent "C'mon pleeeeeeease. $3"/speak Chrissy "No. $2"/speak Vincent "Pleeeeeeeease?"/speak Chrissy "OKAY FINE! $5"/stopMusic/faceDirection Chrissy 3/move farmer 7 0 0 true/pause 500/emote farmer 8/waitForAllStationary/pause 800/playSound newRecipe/message "Chrissy begins shuffling cards"/playMusic playful/speak Vincent "What are you doing? $3"/speak Chrissy "I'm gonna do a magic trick. $2#$b# Pick a card from the top of the deck."/playSound pickUpItem/message "Vincent picks a card and stares at it."/speak Chrissy "Okay, memorize that card."/speak Vincent "Right!"/emote Vincent 16/pause 400/speak Chrissy "Okay, got it? Now put it back in the deck wherever you want."/playSound dwop/message "Vincent puts the card back."/message "Chrissy proceeds to shuffle the deck several times, and then throws whole the deck of cards onto the floor."/playSound dwoop/message "She holds one up."/speak Chrissy "Was this your card? $1"/stopMusic/emote Vincent 40/pause 400/speak Vincent "I don't remember."/speak Chrissy "Of course you don't... $2"/speak Vincent "That was fun, thank you miss!"/speed Vincent 3/move Vincent -12 0 1 true/pause 2000/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Chrissy "$q 6699 null "#You look at the card Chrissy was holding.
